title: SetPropertyAgain (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SetPropertyAgain : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Just gets a properties value and sets it again, to initiate any possible callbacks and hooks when writing the specified property.

rows.Name: itfBACnetObj
rows.Comment:
The BACnet object to use for getting and setting the
property.

rows:
The ID of the property to first get and then set with the
gotten value.
